asset.author: Jockey
asset.hookText:
Shop: http://bit.ly/12WzLfU

Are you ready to GET REAL about your sport performance underwear? Get Jockey Sport. We've spent over a century perfecting what we do best -- underwear. From real athletes like Babe Ruth to real, everyday athletes like you, Jockey delivers the innovation athletes need to perform at their peak.

Our Microfiber Performance underwear features a lightweight fit, high stretch microfiber fabric that moves with you, quick-drying fabric and antimicrobial odor control to keep you feeling odor-free and dry.

No other underwear tested fights odor better or dries faster to help keep you cooler.
